long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of plain old chrome tabs? check out this extension! 

FEATURES.
Get inspired by random Hd background images from Unsplash, with option to select type of images (I set the default to be food, I mean, who doesn't like Hd images of food?). And of course, credits is given to the photographer.

Crypto price updates, with option to choose which crypto.

Time by location.

Get weather updates by your location.
